articles.title: Newton woman facing assault, kidnapping, other charges around alleged unlicensed cosmetic surgery in Allston
articles.description:
The Newton woman faces multiple assault and battery charges after she allegedly performed a cosmetic surgery in an apartment complex, DA says.

The post Newton woman facing assault, kidnapping, other charges around alleged unlicensed cosmetic surgery in Allston appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Newton woman faces multiple charges for alleged unlicensed cosmetic surgery in Allston.
Charges include assault and battery, stemming from incidents in an apartment complex.
Local authorities warn residents about the dangers of unlicensed medical procedures.

articles.title: Patriots defensive coordinator Terrell Williams thrilled to be cancer-free, with team for Super Bowl
articles.description:
Williams attended meetings at the Patriots’ facility during his treatment, but he hasn’t traveled with the team all season and hasn’t been on the sideline since Week 1.

The post Patriots defensive coordinator Terrell Williams thrilled to be cancer-free, with team for Super Bowl appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots' defensive coordinator Terrell Williams is cancer-free and rejoining the team for the Super Bowl.
Williams attended meetings during treatment but hasn't traveled with the team since Week 1.
His return boosts team morale and offers hope to local cancer patients and supporters.

articles.title: Car rammed by train in Abington after breaking down on tracks
articles.description:
A 2007 Honda was smashed by an MBTA train after it broke down on the tracks, Transit Police said.

The post Car rammed by train in Abington after breaking down on tracks appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A 2007 Honda was struck by an MBTA train in Abington.
The incident occurred after the car broke down on the tracks.
Transit Police reported no injuries, but traffic disruptions may affect local commuters.

articles.title: Clintons agree to testify in House Epstein investigation ahead of contempt of Congress vote
articles.description:
Rep. James Comer, the chair of the House Oversight Committee, continued to press for criminal contempt of Congress charges against both Clintons.

The post Clintons agree to testify in House Epstein investigation ahead of contempt of Congress vote appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Clintons agree to testify in House Epstein investigation amid ongoing scrutiny.
Rep. James Comer pushes for contempt of Congress charges against the Clintons.
Potential legal repercussions could affect public trust in political figures in Boston.

articles.title: Woman, 57, walking in road due to snow hit and killed by car on Route 28 in Wareham, DA says
articles.description:
The woman and another pedestrian were walking on the side of the highway because the sidewalk was covered in snow, the DA's office said.

The post Woman, 57, walking in road due to snow hit and killed by car on Route 28 in Wareham, DA says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A 57-year-old woman was struck and killed while walking on Route 28 in Wareham.
The incident occurred due to snow-covered sidewalks, forcing pedestrians into the road.
Local authorities emphasize the need for better snow removal to ensure pedestrian safety.
